Text: May the people who make OST's release the official one soon.

Bless you for this, it's just a shame that Score fans are treated like crap. Instead we get all those "Various B artists who got nothing to do with the movie" album. Spiderman 3 is one of the best scores I've heard in an action movie for years, so get on with it and release the damn score. Thank you for the effort, appreciated.
can we seed this please? thanx.
